annotations.#vepsegift:
SELECT
   c/uid/value as cid, s/items[openEHR-EHR-INSTRUCTION.medication_order.v3]/activities[at0001]/description[at0002]/items[at0070 and name/value='Allergen']/value
FROM
    COMPOSITION c[openEHR-EHR-COMPOSITION.encounter.v1]
     CONTAINS SECTION s[openEHR-EHR-SECTION.adhoc.v1]
      CONTAINS INSTRUCTION [openEHR-EHR-INSTRUCTION.medication_order.v3] AND ACTION [openEHR-EHR-ACTION.medication.v1]
WHERE
    c/archetype_details/template_id/value = 'Allergen_immunterapi_forlop.v*'
    AND s/items[openEHR-EHR-INSTRUCTION.medication_order.v3]/activities[at0001]/description[at0002]/items[at0070 and name/value='Allergen']/value/defining_code/code_string = "ID_9CFAF0FC-505A-480D-95F4-D7E6B2620BD9"
    AND s/items[openEHR-EHR-ACTION.medication.v1]/ism_transition/current_state/value matches {'scheduled','active'}
ORDER BY
    s/items[openEHR-EHR-ACTION.medication.v1]/time/value DESC
LIMIT 1
annotations.#bigift:
SELECT
   c/uid/value as cid, s/items[openEHR-EHR-INSTRUCTION.medication_order.v3]/activities[at0001]/description[at0002]/items[at0070 and name/value='Allergen']/value
FROM
    COMPOSITION c[openEHR-EHR-COMPOSITION.encounter.v1]
     CONTAINS SECTION s[openEHR-EHR-SECTION.adhoc.v1]
      CONTAINS INSTRUCTION [openEHR-EHR-INSTRUCTION.medication_order.v3] AND ACTION [openEHR-EHR-ACTION.medication.v1]
WHERE
    c/archetype_details/template_id/value = 'Allergen_immunterapi_forlop.v*'
    AND s/items[openEHR-EHR-INSTRUCTION.medication_order.v3]/activities[at0001]/description[at0002]/items[at0070 and name/value='Allergen']/value/defining_code/code_string = "ID_548C7594-9A92-4A6D-917F-D02E7565BDD0"
    AND s/items[openEHR-EHR-ACTION.medication.v1]/ism_transition/current_state/value matches {'scheduled','active'}
ORDER BY
    s/items[openEHR-EHR-ACTION.medication.v1]/time/value DESC
LIMIT 1

annotations.calc:
IF(
    AND(
        ISBLANK($bigift),
        ISBLANK($bieStikk)
    ),
    false(),
    true()
)

IF(
    AND(
        ISBLANK($vepsegift),
        ISBLANK($vepseStikk)
    ),
    false(),
    true()
)

IF(
    AND(
        ISBLANK($bigift),
        ISBLANK($vepsegift),
        ISBLANK($bieStikk),
        ISBLANK($vepseStikk)
    ),
    false(),
    true()
)
